titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of February 4 through February 10, 2024, as "National Burn Awareness Week".
Expressing support for the designation of February 4 through February 10, 2024, as "National Burn Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Burn Awareness Week.
